Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Lekythos
Description: Lekythos with a spherical body surmounted by a tall and narrow neck, composed of a cylindrical lower section and a convex upper section (near the orifice). The pronounced lip is short and convex. A spout is probable. An oblique handle connects the neck with the shoulder. There are patches of plant matter on the exterior of the base as well as on the body of the vessel.
